attributes.action: Put a stop to taxing on overtime hours worked, why should workers be penalised
attributes.additional_details: To have an understanding of the need for this petition is the fact that last week i worked 9.5 hours overtime plus and extra 11 hours on a rest day which you'd think would really increase my take home pay but the week prior to that i worked just a rest day of 8 hours and managed to take home just £60 less, so for the extra many hours spent in work away from my family i received just £60 and this is not the first time this has happened I'm sure I'm not the only one and this is why I've created this
attributes.background: Being a dad and seeing the struggle of trying to support my family pay bills, debt etc. Trying to survive on a basic wage is struggle enough so the overtime is an essential part,  I completely understand why we pay tax but why should we be penalised for trying to live without struggle?
